pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tables and Graphs for Generalized Estimating Equations (GEE) Model Fits // Generalized estimating equations (GEE) are a popular choice for analyzing longitudinal binary outcomes. This package provides an interface for fitting GEE, currently for logistic regression, within the 'tern' https://cran.r-project.org/package=tern framework (Zhu, Sabans Bov et al., 2023) and tabulate results easily using 'rtables' https://cran.r-project.org/package=rtables (Becker, Waddell et al., 2023). It builds on 'geepack' doi:10.18637/jss.v015.i02 (Hjsgaard, Halekoh and Yan, 2006) for the actual GEE model fitting.
